alert.note: Alert for Clermont (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN KENTON, WESTERN BRACKEN, SOUTHERN CAMPBELL, NORTHEASTERN GRANT, PENDLETON AND SOUTH CENTRAL CLERMONT COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Butler, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Williamstown, Falmouth, Crittenden, Dry Ridge, Butler, Morgan, Mentor, Moscow, Neville, Chilo, Mount Auburn, Browning Corner, Willow Grove, Bradford, Northcutt, Gardnersville, Peach Grove, Ivor, Fiskburg and Johnsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
